channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 金砖国家开发银行旨在 2024 年提供 50 亿美元贷款
item.description:
BRICS development bank aims to make $5 bln in loans in 2024 https://t.co/dvaYY2Qbz6 pic.twitter.com/ryAeBG6peq

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一位熟悉此事的人士告诉 @路透社，亚当-诺伊曼（Adam Neumann）已经提交了一份超过 5 亿美元的出价，以回购 WeWork。WeWork 是他与他人共同创办的办公共享公司，在其陷入破产前曾将估值推高至 470 亿美元。更多信息请点击这里：
item.description:
Adam Neumann has submitted a bid of more than $500 million to buy back WeWork, the office-sharing company he co-founded and propelled to a $47 billion valuation before it fell into bankruptcy, a person familiar with the matter told @Reuters. More here: https://t.co/PuU3tFPxa5 pic.twitter.com/HMmhj58u3U

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 澳大利亚表示将放宽针对一些流行皮卡车型的碳排放规定，因为该国的汽车游说团体担心这些变化可能会提高汽车价格，并导致消费者的选择减少。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Australia said it would relax proposed carbon emission rules for some popular pick-up trucks after the country's auto lobby raised concerns the changes could raise prices of cars and lead to fewer options for consumers. More here: https://t.co/4BGhOkyPQn

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 消息人士称，中国国家主席习近平将于周三会见美国企业高管
item.description:
China's Xi Jinping to meet with American executives on Wednesday, sources say https://t.co/NKVC86gRbo pic.twitter.com/d0IleMmZdm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 韩国中央银行的一项调查显示，由于对农产品价格上涨的担忧与日俱增，韩国 3 月份的消费者情绪急剧下降。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
South Korea's consumer sentiment dropped sharply in March on growing worries about higher produce prices, a central bank survey showed, as inflation hitting the dinner table emerges as a major policy issue at next month's elections. More here: https://t.co/IN67gAyIaw

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: Partners Group 新发行 120 亿美元私募股权二级市场基金

Partners Group launches new $12 bln private equity secondaries fund https://t.co/3c1gjVpmIG pic.twitter.com/zfUSvsBrZp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周一，华尔街主要股指在假期缩短的一周伊始出现下滑，原因是投资者在本周晚些时候的关键通胀数据公布前进行了布局。更多信息
item.description:
Wall Street's main indexes slipped at the start of a holiday-shortened week on Monday as investors positioned themselves ahead of key inflation data later this week. Read more https://t.co/cVwShi3eox pic.twitter.com/aGbtfIDjQx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: StanChart 首席执行官温特斯会见中国外汇监管机构，成立投资银行部门
item.description:
StanChart CEO Winters meets China FX regulator, launches investment banking unit https://t.co/IR8mzfW4mB pic.twitter.com/tsNpMVB1Fx

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 博彩监管机构称，Blackstone 旗下的皇冠度假村（Crown Resorts）可以保留其经营墨尔本旗舰赌场的执照，两年多前，该赌场因违反反洗钱法而被政府监管。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Blackstone-owned Crown Resorts can keep its license to operate its flagship Melbourne casino, a gambling regulator said, more than two years after the casino was put under government supervision for breaking anti-money laundering laws. More here: https://t.co/ZBY4uc5Qqv

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 继首席执行官戴夫-卡尔霍恩（Dave Calhoun）的动荡任期之后，波音公司董事会已开始寻找一位大腕来掌舵这家陷入困境的飞机制造商。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Boeing's board has begun the search for a big-hitter to take the helm of the troubled planemaker following the turbulent tenure of CEO Dave Calhoun, with many industry executives and analysts predicting it will seek an outside remedy. More here: https://t.co/c26UQwiV0J

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 独家报道一个由高通、谷歌和英特尔等科技公司组成的联盟计划放松英伟达（Nvidia）对人工智能芯片市场的控制，方法是向这家芯片巨头的秘密武器--使开发人员与之绑定的软件--发起进攻。
item.description:
Exclusive: A coalition of tech companies including Qualcomm, Google and Intel plans to loosen Nvidia’s chokehold on the market for artificial-intelligence chips by going after the chip giant’s secret weapon: the software that keeps developers tied to it https://t.co/VggD7E4k9N

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国股市收盘下跌，原因是投资者在本周晚些时候公布关键通胀数据之前评估了美联储可能采取的利率路径。更多信息
item.description:
US stocks ended lower as investors assessed the likely path of interest rates from the Federal Reserve ahead of key inflation data due later this week. Read more https://t.co/cVwShi2GyZ pic.twitter.com/WEPcQV7Vwg

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 26, 2024

item.title: 观看：欧盟反垄断监管机构表示，将对苹果、谷歌和 Meta 可能违反《数字市场法》的行为进行调查，这些公司可能因此被处以巨额罚款
item.description:
WATCH: Apple, Google and Meta will be investigated for potential breaches of the Digital Markets Act, EU antitrust regulators said, potentially leading to hefty fines for the companies https://t.co/9QfpRApwb9 pic.twitter.com/zC9oMTWLzM

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 汉莎航空（Lufthansa）收购意大利 ITA 航空公司股份的计划遭遇波折。欧盟反垄断监管机构警告说，该交易可能会损害竞争并导致价格上涨。
item.description:
Lufthansa's bid to buy a stake in Italy's ITA Airways hit turbulence. The EU's antitrust regulators warned the deal could harm competition and lead to higher prices https://t.co/PEp6VX8k7K pic.twitter.com/izzp9aBHaz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024

item.title: 十年来，欧盟的资本市场联盟计划一直停滞不前，欧洲在全球金融业中的份额不断缩小。丽贝卡-克里斯蒂（Rebecca Christie）说，赋予欧盟监管机构更多权力，同时让各国当局处理日常执法工作，可以打破僵局。
item.description:
The EU's capital markets union plan has been stuck for a decade, with Europe's global finance share shrinking. Rebecca Christie says giving more power to EU watchdogs while letting national authorities handle day-to-day enforcement can break the deadlock pic.twitter.com/j6cCs0Fgnp

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 25, 2024
